extendedInfo.description: Tired of pressing 7 toggles everytime you go to sleep and again when you wake up??***** The full version got a lot of new features (GPS, Sync, Airplane mode in 4.2, Display Brightness - last two need root) in the last weeks. This will come to the free version too, but it will take some time.ON SOME PHONES THE FREE VERSION SHOWS BUGS. THEY ARE NOT PRESENT IN THE FULL VERSION WHICH HAS GOTTEN A LOT OF DEVELOPER-LOVE IN THE LAST WEEKS.THEY WILL BE FIXED WITH THE MAJOR UPDATE FOR THE FREE VERSION COMING SOON.THANKS FOR YOUR PATIENCE AND SUPPORT!********This app provides a widget to turn off WiFi & Co, start your alarm clock or lock your screen immediately, all with just one click!In The morning you can easily revert to your previous settings by clicking the widget again (or the optional notification)! Also the app is prepared for short powernaps during the day.THIS IS THE FREE VERSION OF THE APP. IT CAN NOT RESTORE YOUR PREVIOUS SETTINGS IN THE MORNING.Please consider buying the full version of Good Night Android.The app offers high functionality, helps you to save battery and time.It does not run in the background during night!You can use either the widget or the launcher shortcut to toggle night mode. Please note that ONE OF THEM (WIDGET/SHORTCUT) IS REQUIRED FOR THE APP TO DO ANYTHING before rating bad. Instructions how to install the widget or the shortcut can be found in the app (info-tab).Functions in detail:- 1-Click toggle shortcut for day/night profile- Turn off WiFi, data, Bluetooth, Sound & Vibration- Set your phone to flight mode*- Lock the screen- Start alarm clock- Show good night message with haptic feedback- Switch between dark/light theme- more to come!* Google disabled the ability for apps to toggle flight mode in Android 4.2, so this feature is not available for the newest android version.Full Version offers additional functions:- Restore Settings in the morning- Use alarm clock time to automatically wake up your phone- Schedule automatic sleep/wake up - Choose your preferred alarm app- Prompts directly for entering alarm time instead of only starting alarm clock app.- Widget changing colour for day/night- powernap mode during the dayNext release:Translations for Spanish and FrenchPlease disable lock screen option before uninstalling (to disable device admin)Permissions are required to toggle the hardware settings:BluetoothWiFiWrite Settings - Airplane modeDevice Admin (lock screen)Change and access network state: mobile dataIf you have troubles with the app please contact me before rating low. I don't have all devices to test, so i have to use the emulator. I will give my best to solve your problems ASAP!You have Feature suggestions or want to help me translate this app to your language?Please contact me at goodnightandroid@gmail.comxda Developers Thread:http://forum.xda-developers.com/showthread.php?t=1980889Thank you!

reviews.title: SGS1 Owner
reviews.comment: Cannot deactivate once activated. Cannot even uninstall the app. I had to restore from my Nandroid backup just to remove this app.
reviews.author: Rodel Bagay

reviews.title: Waste of time

reviews.comment: help m not able to uninstall it

reviews.title: Widget crashes, phone locked in airplane mode - uninstalled!
reviews.comment: What a waste of time... The widget crashes everytime, but only after successfully switching my HTC One XL to airplane mode, which it then cannot be taken out of without resetting the handset. Worth paying for Tasker instead!
reviews.author: Jen Shepherd

reviews.title: Great App!
reviews.comment: I\'ve been searching for an App like this forever! GNA perfectly fits my needs. Keep up the good work!!!
